message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which holds immense value to us due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. We believe it's worth more than $100, but let's start our discussion with an offer of $150. This exceptional item could be a great addition to your collection or serve as a valuable asset depending on your needs. Please let me know if this price interests you, and we can proceed with the transaction.
